title: How to Peel Tamarillos

steps.headline: Place the tamarillos into a large bowl.
Bring water to boil in the kettle.
Pour the boiling water over the tamarillos in the bowl.
steps.description: Leave to sit in the hot water for two minutes.

steps.headline: Drain off the hot water carefully.
Plunge the tamarillos into a bowl or sink of cold water.
steps.description: Start peeling the cooled tamarillos. You'll find that the skin lifts off easily. Use your usual peeling method, such as using a peeler or a small peeling knife.

steps.headline: Use as required.
steps.description: Tamarillos are great eaten as they are, with ice cream, in fruit salad, or added to a pavlova.

text: Place the tamarillos into a large bowl.  Bring water to boil in the kettle.  Pour the boiling water over the tamarillos in the bowl. Leave to sit in the hot water for two minutes. Drain off the hot water carefully.  Plunge the tamarillos into a bowl or sink of cold water. Start peeling the cooled tamarillos. You'll find that the skin lifts off easily. Use your usual peeling method, such as using a peeler or a small peeling knife. Use as required. Tamarillos are great eaten as they are, with ice cream, in fruit salad, or added to a pavlova.
